name: Guildhall
description: A hub of local governance or public administration; adventurers may seek permits, records, or appeal to authorities.
atmosphere: The guildhall has an imposing, authoritative atmosphere with the sound of formal meetings and the rustle of official documents. The air carries the scent of leather, ink, and the weight of organized power. The atmosphere crackles with the energy of professional organization and the influence of collective bargaining.
